p: A data set, composed of 16 S. kitaibelii, 54 T. serpyllum, 53 O. vulgare ssp. vulgare, 63 A. millefolium and 4 A. clypeolata samples and 13 variables (the main EO constituents), were depicted using a correlation network graph for visualization correlations between chemical compounds from EOs (Spearmanâ€™s rank order correlation coefficient, r). Non-significant correlations were removed from the correlation network graph.
